step.sql: SELECT P.* FROM RD_NODE P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_NODE T WHERE P.NODE_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_NODE_FORM P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_NODE T WHERE P.NODE_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_NODE_NAME P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_NODE T WHERE P.NODE_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_NODE_MESH P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_NODE T WHERE P.NODE_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM ADAS_RDNODE_SLOPE_DTM P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_NODE T WHERE P.NODE_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM ADAS_RDNODE_INFO_DTM P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_NODE T WHERE P.NODE_PID=T.PID;
DELETE FROM RD_NODE P WHERE P.NODE_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_NODE);
DELETE FROM RD_NODE_FORM P WHERE P.NODE_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_NODE);
DELETE FROM RD_NODE_NAME P WHERE P.NODE_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_NODE);
DELETE FROM RD_NODE_MESH P WHERE P.NODE_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_NODE);
DELETE FROM ADAS_RDNODE_SLOPE_DTM P WHERE P.NODE_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_NODE);
DELETE FROM ADAS_RDNODE_INFO_DTM P WHERE P.NODE_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_NODE);
